thread.title: Everton to battle with Manchester City over signature of highly-rated English goalkeeper
thread.title_full: Everton to battle with Manchester City over signature of highly-rated English goalkeeper

title: Everton to battle with Manchester City over signature of highly-rated English goalkeeper
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Everton to battle with Manchester City over signature of highly-rated English goalkeeper EVERTON are ready to go head to head with Manchester City as the battle to land Sunderland goalkeeper Jordan Pickford starts to gather pace. PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 22:30, Sat, Feb 18, 2017 GETTY Jordan Pickford could spark a bidding war this summer 
Pickford who was called into the England squad for the first time earlier this season is expected to quit the Stadium of Light if Sunderland are relegated. 
He was handed a new contract earlier in the season but has made it clear that he wants to be playing in the Premier League next season. 
Pickford is set to return to action after a lengthy spell on the sidelines with a knee injury has been on the radar of both clubs all season. GETTY Ronald Koeman wants to bring Pickford to Everton 
Arsenal and Chelsea have also taken a look at a player who is rated as one of the best young goalkeepers in the country by England boss Gareth Southgate. 
The England under-21 international, 22, is seen by City as someone who could bolster their quota of home grown players. Nine highest rated players so far this season Sat, February 18, 2017 Express Sport brings you the nine highest rated players so far this season. Stats according to whoscored.com
